    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>

            <entry>cahi1:data_106671</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The weight of an object and its distance from the Earth's centre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Gewicht einer Nachricht und sein Abstand von 
der Mitte der Masse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le poids d'un objet et sa distance du centre de 
la terre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O peso de um objeto e sua distância do centro da
terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il peso di un oggetto e la relativa distanza dal 
centro della terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το βάρος ενός αντικειμένου και της απόστασής του από
το γήινο κέντρο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El peso de un objeto y su distancia del centro de
la tierra</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This figure illustrates that the force of gravity experienced by an object that depends on its position and distance from the centre of the Earth.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Acceleration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">centre of the Earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">distance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gravity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mass</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">position</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">weight</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung veranschaulicht daß die Kraft 
von Schwerkraft erfahren durch eine Nachricht, die von seiner Position
und von Abstand von der Mitte der Masse abhängt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette figure illustre que la force de la 
pesanteur éprouvée par un objet qui dépend de sa position et 
distance du centre de la terre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta figura ilustra que a força da gravidade 
experimentada por um objeto que dependa de suas posição e distância
do centro da terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa figura illustra che la forza di gravità 
sperimentata da un oggetto che dipende dalla relative posizione e 
distanza dal centro della terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτός ο αριθμός διευκρινίζει ότι η δύναμη της 
βαρύτητας που βιώνεται από ένα αντικείμενο που εξαρτάται από τη
θέση και την απόστασή του από το κέντρο της γης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta figura ilustra que la fuerza de la gravedad 
experimentada por un objeto que dependa de su posición y distancia 
del centro de la tierra.</string>
          </description>
